templates.productLaunchDesc: Suitable for new product launches and introductions

1. Product Background & Market Analysis
2. Core Features & Highlights
3. Technical Advantages & Innovations
4. Market Positioning & Target Users
5. Business Model & Revenue Strategy
6. Development Plan & Future Outlook
7. Q&A Session

1. Project Background & Objectives
2. Project Progress & Milestones
3. Key Achievements & Data
4. Issues Encountered & Solutions
5. Team Collaboration & Contributions
6. Next Steps
7. Summary & Outlook

2. Core Concepts & Theories
3. Practical Cases & Operations

2. Target Customer Profiles

6. Execution Plan & Timeline
7. Risk Control & Assessment

generate.outlineGenerationCompleteDesc: AI has generated professional content outline for you
generate.generatedOutlineTemplate:
Based on "{{topic}}" topic, AI-generated content outline for you:

1. Introduction & Background
   â€¢ Topic background introduction
   â€¢ Current situation analysis
   â€¢ Problems and challenges

2. Core Content
   â€¢ Main viewpoints elaboration
   â€¢ Data support and cases
   â€¢ Solution proposals

3. Implementation Strategy
   â€¢ Specific action plans
   â€¢ Timeline arrangements

4. Expected Results
   â€¢ Goal achievement expectations
   â€¢ Risk control measures
   â€¢ Success indicators

5. Summary & Outlook
   â€¢ Key points review
   â€¢ Future development directions
   â€¢ Call to action

This outline covers all aspects of the topic, with clear structure and strong logic, suitable for creating professional PPT presentations.
generate.outlineConclusion: This outline covers all aspects of the topic, with clear structure and strong logic, suitable for creating professional PPT presentations.

progress.contentStructureProgress: Progress estimation based on content structure
progress.pptStructureProgress: Calculate progress based on PPT structure characteristics
progress.timeBasedProgress: Time-based progress estimation (assuming total time about 15-30 seconds)
progress.updateFormContent: Update form content and complete progress

comments.useFixedIncrement: Use fixed increment to avoid hydration errors caused by random values
comments.noteNotResetProgress: Note: Don't reset progress here because we want to maintain 100% display after generation completes
comments.callDedicatedEnhancement: Call dedicated prompt enhancement interface, system prompts are injected on the server side
comments.updateFormToEnhanced: Update form content to enhanced content
comments.handleCompleteState: Handle complete state: when progress is 100% and not generating, all steps should show as completed
comments.optionsCardAboveInput: Options Card - place options above input box
comments.contentInputCardSimplified: Content Input Card - simplified single input box

pricing.readyToStart: Ready to start your PPT creation journey?
pricing.readyToStartDesc: Register now, enjoy free trial, experience AI-driven PPT creation revolution

faqQuestions.q1: How to choose the right membership plan?
faqQuestions.a1: We recommend starting with the free version to experience basic features. Individual users are recommended the personal plan, enterprise users can choose enterprise or custom plans. Our customer service team will provide professional advice based on your specific needs.
faqQuestions.a2: We support Alipay, WeChat Pay, bank cards and other payment methods. All payments are processed through third-party secure platforms to ensure your fund safety.
faqQuestions.q3: Can I upgrade or downgrade membership anytime?
faqQuestions.a3: You can upgrade membership anytime, new fees are calculated proportionally. Downgrading needs to wait until the current cycle ends. Upgrades take effect immediately, downgrades take effect in the next billing cycle.
faqQuestions.q4: Are there copyright issues with AI-generated content?
faqQuestions.a4: We use self-developed AI models, generated content is completely original with no copyright risks. Commercial license users can safely use for commercial purposes.
faqQuestions.q5: What is the technical support response time?
faqQuestions.a5: Free users: Response within 24 hours; Personal plan: Response within 12 hours; Enterprise plan: Response within 4 hours; Custom plan: Dedicated account manager, instant response.
